section.note: Before adjusting the camera's focal length configuration, it is recommended to call to query the device's supported focal length capabilities, and configure accordingly. Due to limitations on some Android devices, even if you configure the focal length type based on the result of , the setting may not take effect.

Before adjusting the camera focal length configuration, it is recommended to call to check the supported focal length capabilities of the device, and then configure accordingly. Due to limitations of some Android devices, the configuration may not take effect even if you set the focal length type based on the result of .

Before adjusting the camera focal length configuration, it is recommended to call to query the supported focal length capabilities of the device, and then configure accordingly. Due to limitations on some Android devices, even if the focal length type is set according to the result of , the setting may not take effect.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called before starting local camera capture, such as before calling or .
You must call this method before enabling local camera capture, such as before calling or .
You must call this method before starting local camera capture, such as before calling and .
You must call this method before starting local camera capture, such as before calling and .

plentry.pd: Camera capture configuration. See . You do not need to set the deviceId parameter in this method.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.

section.p:
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
